entries.meaning: A usually small indoor receptacle for items that are to be discarded; a rubbish bin.

verbs.description: wastebasket (third-person singular simple present wastebaskets, present participle wastebasketing, simple past and past participle wastebasketed)

examples: I was aweary, aweary, and I put it in the waste basket. Ten days later the bill came again, and with it a shadowy threat. I waste-basketed it.
